innova_audio_recorder.config_update_error: Problem while updating audio recorder configuration.
innova_audio_recorder.end_recording_message:
Recording is complete.
It is placed in your temporary list.
innova_audio_recorder.end_recording_message_maxtime_reached:
The recording has reached the maximum allowed time.
He was stopped and placed in your temporary list.
innova_audio_recorder.max_try_threshold_reached:
The temporary list is full.
Delete files to record again.
innova_audio_recorder.resource_creation_error: An error occured while creating resource.
innova_audio_recorder.resource_creation_error_download: Please use the download button to save your audio file locally.
